Models¶

django-gallery provides default Photo model.

class gallery.models.Photo(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Represents user added image.

Reads and saves image exif data if available (accessed with attrs exif_available, exif_data) and creates thumbnails according to THUMBNAIL_SIZES

update_exif(image)[source]¶

Update model exif data based on image.

gallery.models.THUMBNAIL_SIZES¶

Sizes of thumbs to generate when uploading an image

gallery.models.upload_to(instance, filename)[source]¶

Creates separate directory for every user’s gallery
